description: From the parking area, cross the road and look for a trail on the left (north) side of the creek.  The trail follows the edge of the creek valley via a fairly well defined trail to the pass.Look back while climbing for good views of the Spray Lakes.  From the pass great views of the Wind Valley and the Three Sisters can be had.This trail is trail 65 in the Kananaskis Country trail Guide.NTS Map: 082J14Elevation Gain: 381 m (1,250 ft).
directions: Park at (WGS-84): N50 58.567 W115 19.297This is 4.8 km south of the Spray District Office at Spurling Creek on the Smith-DorrienÂ?Spray Trail (Hwy.742).  Park on the south-west side of the road.
title: West Wind Pass
